title: Couples Escape in Fijiâ€™s Island of Love with Romantic Inclusions
description: Let romance find you at the adults-only Lomani Island Resort on Malolo Lailai, a dreamy Fijian island located in the archipelago of Mamanuca. Embrace the island life and enjoy daily full American style breakfast, three one-course dinners at the resort's beachfront restaurant, a sunset cruise, a 60-minute couples' massage and a romantic sunset experience with bean bags on the beach, a bottle of sparkling and a private serenade!
